CustomField.description: This field determines if the Opportunity has progressed since the request for services involvement was made.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( Opportunity__r.Probability > Opportunity_Probability_at_Request__c, OR( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.StageName, "Closed Lost")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.StageName, "Closed - No Decision")) ) ), TRUE, FALSE )
CustomField.label: Opportunity Progressed?
